question:
What are the main agendas of the Non-cooperation movement of Odisha?
a) Boycott of schools and colleges
b) Boycott of British goods
c) Boycott of courts
d) Boycott of Government services
explanation:
Agendas of the first phase- Boycott of schools and colleges, Boycott of British goods, Boycott off courts, Boycott of Government services
Agendas of the second phase- Hindu Muslim unity, Promotion ofÂ  khadar, Removal of untouchability, Promotion of national education
